## Task 1: Control Flow Practice
```{r}
bp_df$treatment$status <- character(20)
bp_df$placebo$status <- character(10)
```

to characterize the post-treatment (or placebo) blood pressure measurement as
 optimal (≤ 120), borderline (120 < bp ≤ 130), and high (> 130). First, create a new column
 in each data frame from above called status.
```{r}
for (i in 1:nrow(bp_list$treatment)){
  if(bp_list$treatment$post_bp[i] <= 120){
bp_list$treatment$status[i] <- "optimal"
  } else if (bp_list$treatment$post_bp[i] <= 130){
bp_list$treatment$status[i] <- "borderline"
  } else {
bp_list$treatment$status[i] <- "high"
  }
}
```
